author: sdeboy
msg: Now using host from remoteSourceInfo (if available) as the 'hostname' property for use in Chainsaw if no 'hostname' property was provided on the event.

author: sdeboy
msg: Added automatic colorizing of selected node and child nodes in logger tree panel.  Deactivated when 'focus on' is in use or the 'Root Logger' is selected.

author: sdeboy
msg: Minor change to 'scroll to bottom' behavior to ensure context menu always matched expected behavior (scroll to bottom wouldn't stay selected in some cases).

author: psmith
msg: This change makes any jar in the plugins directory given an AllPermssion policy setting.

author: sdeboy
msg: Modified 'scroll to bottom' behavior:  Selecting the 'scroll to bottom' context menu now selects the bottom row.  Select any row other than the bottom row to deactivate scroll to bottom.
